trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGULWHISTORY3_00894_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>The panel bears information on the history of the Milalla.

TEXT_REGULWHISTORY3_00894_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>(-Chapter III-)Since ancient times, the Milalla have excelled in calculations. By using formulae and figures to represent all natural phenomena, they had succeeded in devising a unique system of magic.

TEXT_REGULWHISTORY3_00894_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>(-Chapter III-)This gift proved invaluable in their new homeland, where they employed their calculations to etch arcane circuits upon the ore which later came to be known as electrope.

TEXT_REGULWHISTORY3_00894_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>(-Chapter III-)Through this ingenious technique, electrope was transformed into a tool that could not only store lightning, but convert it into energy of any element.
